body: I'd rather not store the graph variables explicitly in the GrapplerItem to keep it small. The variable initializers are already listed under the init_ops. It would be better to just store the variable snapshots here instead of the whole VariableDef
body_html: I'd rather not store the graph variables explicitly in the GrapplerItem to keep it small. The variable initializers are already listed under the init_ops. It would be better to just store the variable snapshots here instead of the whole VariableDef
